text: @washingtonpost With Tesla's immense experience dealing with #COVID19 in #Shanghai factory, between #tesla and Wanda's Nail Parlor, letting nail parlors to open while keeping #gigafactory shut is dumb. #alameda should learn from Tesla, and use its protocols on the rest of the businesses.
